content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate production at position(x=52.0, y=-80.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace at position (x=52.0, y=-80.0) with copper ore as input and copper plate as output

### Copper plate production at position(x=52.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace at position (x=52.0, y=-82.0) with unknown input and iron plate as output

### Copper plate production at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace at position (x=52.0, y=-84.0) with no input and no output


### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
- Ensure the inventory is not full before attempting to insert items
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when furnace fuel source is full
- Make sure to remove or use the fuel from the furnace before adding more fuel
### Errors when furnace source is full
- Make sure to remove or use the input from the furnace before adding more input
